<S%G1161><s%> (I also <S%G2532><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> the household <S%G3624><s%> of Stephanas; <S%G4734><s%> besides <S%G3063><s%> them, <S%G3756><s%> I don't know <S%G1492><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> other. <S%G243><s%>)

but <S%G235><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> the foolish things <S%G3474><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> that he might put to <S%G2443><s%> shame <S%G2617><s%> those who are wise. <S%G4680><s%> <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> chose <S%G1586><s%> the weak things <S%G772><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> that he might put to <S%G2443><s%> shame <S%G2617><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that are strong; <S%G2478><s%>
